comment:
logistics:Logistics refers to the detailed coordination of a complex operation involving many people, facilities, or supplies, in this case, the transportation of water through pipes.
units of water per minute:This refers to the amount of water that can be transported through a pipe in a given time frame, with wide pipes transporting 25 units and narrow pipes transporting 15 units per minute.
minimize:To minimize in this context means to reduce the total number of pipes required to meet the water transportation needs while still meeting the specified constraints.
